metadata.Name: DaNetQA
metadata.Description: A yes/no question answering dataset for the Russian language. It contains over 3,500 question-paragraph pairs from the news domain. The task is to determine if the answer to the question is 'yes' or 'no' based on the paragraph.
metadata.Paper Title: DaNetQA: a yes/no Question Answering Dataset for the Russian Language
metadata.Venue Title: Analysis of Images, Social Networks and Texts
metadata.Venue Name: 9th International Conference on Analysis of Images, Social Networks and Texts (AIST)
metadata.Abstract: This paper introduces DaNetQA, a question answering dataset for the Russian language. The task is to answer a yes/no question based on a given paragraph. The dataset is based on the PARus dataset, which was collected from the news domain and contains more than 3,500 question-paragraph pairs. We describe the process of creating the dataset and provide statistics on it. We also present several baselines, including a fine-tuned BERT-based model, and report their performance on the dataset. The dataset is publicly available.
